attributes.action: 10% of our food should go to people with less than us!
attributes.additional_details: 10% of our food that is brought into the country should be given to people that don't have enough food. Charities like If should be included in this as their charity is providing food, water and shelter to people who need it. If this happened it would change lives and save people. Our country has enough food to share with people in need in this country but also enough for people in other.
